summary:
I have a no-nonsense attitude and throw myself wholeheartedly into the job at hand. I like to develop myself in a job and am eager to learn. I am a team player and am also capable to take action as an individual. Trustworthy, loyal and with absolute integrity, I have a solid work ethic and readily accept responsibility. Easy to get on with, I am able to quickly develop a rapport with colleagues and develop external relations.  

Mid 1980’s I had set my goal to change my future as an electrical engineer and signed up for the newly introduced Petroleum and Gas Education at “MTS Noorderhaaks” also known as “Hogere Zeevaartschool Den Helder”. I completed the education with Mechanical Engineering in 1992. I have held various positions ever since and managed to become a Directional Driller early 2006, having full responsibility for drilling an oil- or gas- well including BHA design, maintaining the designed well trajectory, HSE, Toolbox Talks, Safe Job Analysis, Logistics  and Costs.

Out of office I am a so called “petrol-head”. Since 2005 I  have organized various (and yearly) automotive events in Europe - for 50 to 150 participants.
